description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Ready for extreme planking?  You’ll plank in places you’ve never dreamed of!  Plank inside a taco, on a cat’s stomach, or even on Mars!  Over 60 crazy locations,  famous landmarks, and beautiful vistas await your avatar in Avatar Planking!  Don’t forget to make a silly face for the camera!
